Class Database.DatabaseSession

java.lang.Object
dev.royalcore.api.data.Database.DatabaseSession
Enclosing class:
Database
public class Database.DatabaseSession extends Object
Table/session abstraction; all methods are asynchronous and thread-safe.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    CompletableFuture<Void>
    delete()
    Deletes the entire table (use with caution).
    CompletableFuture<Void>
    ensureExists()
    Ensures that the underlying table exists, creating it if necessary.
    CompletableFuture<String>
    read(String key)
    Reads a string value by key.
    <T> CompletableFuture<Map<String,T>>
    readAll(Class<T> type)
    Reads all entries in this table and deserializes them as the given type.
    CompletableFuture<Double>
    readDouble(String key)
    Reads a double value, logging a warning if the stored data is malformed.
    CompletableFuture<Integer>
    readInt(String key)
    Reads an integer value, logging a warning if the stored data is malformed.
    <T> CompletableFuture<T>
    readObject(String key, Class<T> type)
    Reads a POJO that was previously serialized by Gson.
    CompletableFuture<Void>
    write(String key, Object value)
    Writes a key-value pair to the table, replacing any existing entry.

  • Method Details

    • ensureExists

      @Nullable public CompletableFuture<Void> ensureExists()
      Ensures that the underlying table exists, creating it if necessary.
      Returns:
      a future that completes when the table has been checked or created

    • write

      @Nullable public CompletableFuture<Void> write(String key, Object value)
      Writes a key-value pair to the table, replacing any existing entry.

      Primitive-like types are stored as plain strings, all other objects are serialized as JSON using Gson.

      Parameters:
      key - the key to write
      value - the value to store (primitive or POJO)
      Returns:
      a future that completes when the write finishes

    • read

      @Nullable public CompletableFuture<String> read(String key)
      Reads a string value by key.
      Parameters:
      key - the key to read
      Returns:
      a future with the stored string value, or null if missing

    • readInt

      public CompletableFuture<Integer> readInt(String key)
      Reads an integer value, logging a warning if the stored data is malformed.
      Parameters:
      key - the key to read
      Returns:
      a future with the parsed integer value, or null if missing or invalid

    • readAll

      public <T> CompletableFuture<Map<String,T>> readAll(Class<T> type)
      Reads all entries in this table and deserializes them as the given type.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the result object type
      Parameters:
      type - the target class for deserialization
      Returns:
      a future with a map of keys to deserialized objects

    • readDouble

      @Nullable public CompletableFuture<Double> readDouble(String key)
      Reads a double value, logging a warning if the stored data is malformed.
      Parameters:
      key - the key to read
      Returns:
      a future with the parsed double value, or null if missing or invalid

    • readObject

      @Nullable public <T> CompletableFuture<T> readObject(String key, Class<T> type)
      Reads a POJO that was previously serialized by Gson.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the result object type
      Parameters:
      key - the key to read
      type - the target class for deserialization
      Returns:
      a future with the deserialized object, or null if missing or invalid

    • delete

      @Nullable public CompletableFuture<Void> delete()
      Deletes the entire table (use with caution).
      Returns:
      a future that completes when the table has been dropped
